name: Rewind Me (HecxaDev Studio)
description:
Rewind Me was made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 Game Jam.

Im still working on the game, and new levels will be added in the future.

I've had tons of fun exploring the gameplay mechanics of the game, and I hope you enjoy playing around with them aswell.

The Game takes place in an underground facility, where a private company does experiments with time travel. Testing it on humans, not everyone survives, but you did. Now you have these powers, but everyone vanished. You have to find out what happend.
